website_summaries.verdict: For those who like to use bump casting, you'll appreciate the split grip design in this well-priced casting rod.
pros: Considering the price you'll pay, this casting rod has an excellent level of construction
Uses a slightly lighter weight fiberglass than others for more comfort
Gives you the stiffness you need to set the hook properly, while also reeling in larger fish successfully
Uses a high-visibility glow tip so you can see nibbles early in the morning or late at night
cons: Tip of the casting rod is very brittle, which means it may break under pressure

customer_reviews.title: Great for large cats
customer_reviews.text: I fish for big cats nearly every weekend and have been very pleased with the overall quality of these poles. I bought one and paired it with an Abu Garcia 6500c and could not be happier. The pole is very durable and the stainless steel eyelets scream quality. I have more expensive poles, but find myself drawn to this one, so much so that I had to buy another one. I will buy more in the future. You can't go wrong with this pole.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rod for those of us who don't want to ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect rod for those of us who don't want to squirm every time you get a scratch on your rig. These rods have a great action and loads of backbone. I really couldn't be happier for the price. They're comparable to an Ugly Stik Tiger, but with a smoother action and at nearly half the price. The Tiger was my favorite factory rod for cats until I got two of these. I paired two of them with some Abu Garcia TG6000C reels and plan to be ordering the larger size for my 7000's. I will definitely be buying more...
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: These are very powerful, stiff rods. They inspire a ton of confidence while fighting large fish. I cast 2 to 4 ounces of lead with heavy cut bait chunks without issue. Sensitivity is lacking, but honestly, who cares? The split grip is very ergonomic and guides and reel seats seem quite strong. Not perfect on the guide alignment, but close enough to satisfy me.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Ferrell

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Item was broke. No response from seller after contact was made on my part
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Lugo

customer_reviews.title: backbone
customer_reviews.text: My favorite cat rod -plenty of backbone for pulling the big ones out of the tangles.
customer_reviews.author: FINMAN

customer_reviews.title: Perfect catfish rod to mate up with my Abu Garcia ...
customer_reviews.text: I will be buying more. Perfect catfish rod to mate up with my Abu Garcia 6500C3 reels. Cast excellently, build quality is awesome. Rippin Lips, if you are reading this... Make another rod option with the same setup, only use cork and aluminum reel seats. There are tons of guys on the catfish circuit that would be all over these if you could offer those two things in the $65 range. Myself included, that said.... I will order 3 more of these as soon as I christmas passes.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Miller

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Coming from a 6 foot graphite CastAway I was unsure how much I would like this rod. I am pleased to say that this thing is amazing. It is way more sensitive that I thought it would be. I've taken it out 3 times so far and have landed a total of 23 cats.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy guynes

customer_reviews.title: Great catfish rod
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of the 7 6 med hvy with 2 kastking rover 60 reels awesome combination, using 25 lb trilene big game they will cast further than all my 30+ abu 6500c3's and my 7000c3's will be getting several more, if you break down these reels they are the same as abu, with the exception of a brass gear for the level wind on the kastking and plastic on the abu, which makes no difference in the quality or casting ability
customer_reviews.author: don jones sr

customer_reviews.title: Good pole for the price
customer_reviews.text: Feels like a higher end pole without the high end price. The pole isnt as flexible as some like to have, its more for big fish. Ive caught fish from 2lbs to 50lbs and it handled them all like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: .eagle fire

customer_reviews.title: Great Rod
customer_reviews.text: Gonna start off by saying I was very skeptical how good this rod would be when I first seen the price, but after reading other reviews decided why not. I'm using the rod for catfish and striper and must say it has preformed phenomenally. I will definitely be buying more of these rods in the future.
customer_reviews.author: APal87

customer_reviews.title: Love the metal hook holder
customer_reviews.text: Great for big cats. Added the Abu Garcia 7000C3 to them for the best rod and reels I ever had. Love the metal ring on the bottom for putting the hook into. That will save you from hooking it on the eyes and damaging them.
customer_reviews.author: BJ Cason

customer_reviews.title: Will order again
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my rods. I love the sensitivity on them small little 3lb cats are fun even northerns I used them for trolling for salmon and trout and was run and held up good
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: The medium heavy rod has the best soft tip ive ever found for launching cut baits ...
customer_reviews.text: Very tough, yet surprisingly light and sensitive. The medium heavy rod has the best soft tip ive ever found for launching cut baits far into the river. And it has all the back bone I'll ever need to coax those monster blues and flathead from their deep holes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great! VERY durable!
customer_reviews.text: ery durable. Very thick. Recieved it quickly. I havent found any defects and ive had them several months now. I feel I could catch a 100lb fish with this and it wouldnt phase the pole. Highly recommended to serious cat fishing/ flat head fishers out there!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Alden

customer_reviews.title: great value and seemingly nice quality
customer_reviews.text: great value and seemingly nice quality. i will find out performance this weekend when I try these lines out on the pacific chasing Yellowtail and other game fish species around Catalina Island!
customer_reviews.author: Big Hendo

customer_reviews.title: CASTING DISTANCE!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing casting. Very strong and the guides are no longer a concern (breaking or insert pop out). Perfect blend of graphite and glass. One thing I recommend is to regularly clean the guides especially when fishing saltwater. Chrome looks good but rusts and gets corroded if neglected. Pulls in big saltwater fish just fine. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Duane P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent rod
customer_reviews.text: This rod is really nice I’ve had it for almost a month. I’ve caught multiple catfish in the 5 pound range and a few stripers around 5 also and it works great. My only problem was the box it came in was junky it was 2 boxes put together and a very small problem was the guide on the tip of the rod was lose but I fixed it with super glue now it’s good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Carson w.

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations love this rod 1st fish brought in was a 33lb ...
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded expectations love this rod 1st fish brought in was a 33lb Striper an have caught several 8 to 10lb cats still waiting for the monster I know this rod will handle with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Rose

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this rod I run a large bait caster on it with out any balance issues just wish it was a 2 piece rod it's extremely good quality for the money
customer_reviews.author: thomas

customer_reviews.title: Best rod for 40$
customer_reviews.text: This is second one! Landed a 25lb Jack The other days with ease! Can’t beat the quality for the price. Surprising light too.
customer_reviews.author: Xiao h Zhou

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful rod
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful rod definitely great for big cats but the small ones would be more fun one a smaller sweet up but I do recommend this rod and would buy again for a second one
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Nice pole
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy pole, no problem with large catfish 20+ pounds is what I caught on it so far but I'm willing to bet I could reel in a 50+ pounder on it.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: It's a very nice rod. Haven't caught anything super sized yet but ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice rod. Haven't caught anything super sized yet but it's well constructed and looks nice. However the tip doesn't really glow on either of the 2 I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Chris T

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Catfishing or Striper rod for boats
customer_reviews.text: Love these rods. I have $200+ Catfishing rods and I've bought a pair of these twice. I'm slowly swapping all my reels to these rods. Great river rods and perfect for a boat.
customer_reviews.author: James Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great Rod. Arrived broken though...
customer_reviews.text: I'm really impressed with the quality and feel of this rod. The only problem is that it arrived with the tip broken off. I was going to return it, but decided it wasn't worth the trouble. No worries though because I have a repair kit and I prefer a shorter rod anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Guresky

customer_reviews.title: Great action, strong
customer_reviews.text: For the money these rods can't be beat. Great action, strong, casts great, and a really good feel. Why spend the big bucks on other rods that will not be any better than Rippin Lips rods.
customer_reviews.author: Darrel Wray

customer_reviews.title: rod defective upon reciept
customer_reviews.text: The first eye on rod closest to butt was defective. It would have frayed line or cut line if this is an indicator of this CO. quality I'am glad I found it immediately on opening!
customer_reviews.author: mark picklerpixplace

customer_reviews.title: If you’re looking for a quality fishing pole for a great price you have found it
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 of these and I honestly don’t think you can find another pole of the quality of these for the price. I will definitely end up getting another one. Back bone for the big ones sensitivity for the small ones.
customer_reviews.author: Catfish king

customer_reviews.title: Much too stiff
customer_reviews.text: This rod appears to well made., however it is very, very stiff and would be okay for saltwater surf fishing, or someone who expects to catch 15lb+ catfish.
customer_reviews.author: gruenetx1Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality made rod.
customer_reviews.text: This rod is quality made,, haven't caught anything big.... but made very very well for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Markkkk

customer_reviews.title: and I am very happy with this one
customer_reviews.text: I'm fairly picky about poles, and I am very happy with this one. Good backbone with a fairly soft tip, nice line guides with no inserts, and a good size.
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: all ok
customer_reviews.text: not cough any big ones yet but i think it will be ok
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Couch

customer_reviews.title: High quality tough rod!
customer_reviews.text: For the money this rod is awesome. Looks and feels of high quality. Used this rod on two catfishing trips so far and handled 10 lb-24 lb catfish very well. Going in the morning for early bite and looking forward to wearing some more out!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Vidrine

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I got the medium heavy 7'6" rod...It looks great and feels great...Im shocked at how light it is but feels like its plenty strong...There are better rods out there but this rod is a steal for under $40...Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hayslip

customer_reviews.title: Great looking rod
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel of this rod. Paired it with my Abu Garcia C4. Haven't had a chance to take and out it. I will post after fishing trip.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Here kitty kitty....
customer_reviews.text: Love this rod. Lands the big ones easily! I fish the TN river.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite casting rods you can really sling some heavy baits.
customer_reviews.author: Dlopez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great rods. These hold up to really big fish and I will order more.
customer_reviews.author: M. Spence

customer_reviews.title: Broken rod
customer_reviews.text: Item came late and it was broken:/ it was a birthday gift.

customer_reviews.title: Fine Rod
customer_reviews.text: For the money, you won't beat it. You get a really good rod.

customer_reviews.title: Great rod
customer_reviews.text: Well made, very durable and handles big fish really well.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great rod for the price. Guides rust in the salt. Prob lably not SS guides

customer_reviews.text: Love this rod! I use it to catch 30-50lb catchfish out of the Mississippi....it's strenghth is impressive!

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent rod. Would have given 5 stars but the packaging it comes in is pretty sketchy. The UPS driver actually opened in front of me to make sure it wasn’t broke.

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a great rod.
customer_reviews.text: Rod seems well built and feels really good. I will be doing a full review of this Rod on my YouTube channel "Missouri Agitater" I will also be using this Rod during this season and making full vlogs about it in use.

customer_reviews.title: Great rod at great price
customer_reviews.text: Just as good if not better than rods double the price

customer_reviews.title: Great rod
customer_reviews.text: Love this rod, will handle big blues and flatheads with ease, have it paired with a kastking rover 60.

customer_reviews.title: This rod will bring the big fish home!
customer_reviews.text: Got this rod for catching big blue cats and it will sure do the job. I recently caught a 53 pounder that would have destroyed a weaker rod,but this rod took the beating with no signs of wear and tear.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good rod that I got for my dad
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good rod that I got for my dad. Wish it could break away for easier storage. I'll be happy to see him use it though.

customer_reviews.title: ... but put it through a couple tests and performed great we will see and i will update once i ...

customer_reviews.title: good backbone and strong guides
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the Rippin' Lips rod. good backbone and strong guides. I have heard some don't like the blank exposed on the lower handle. A wrap of paracord in your favorite color fits it perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking rod
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking rod. I havnt got to try it out yet but was impressed with how it looked. I ordered the spinning rod also.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Worked gread! BEST VALUE FOR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: I landed a 20lb flathead the first night! Works great with Shimano tyrnos 20 reel

customer_reviews.title: For the money, these rods cant be beat. ...
customer_reviews.text: For the money, these rods cant be beat. I fish heavy current with 5 and 6 oz weights with no issues. plenty of backbone for big fish

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: I have used this rod five times already it has performed flawlessly I love it

customer_reviews.title: Great rod for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This rod looks good and it performs well. It’s got a good balance of flex and power. I’ve used it to catch, bluefish, catfish and lot of Sea Robins this past season in Raritan Bay.

customer_reviews.title: Great rod for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great rod. Teamed this rod with a Abu Garcia Rocket. This cheap rod and expensive reel make a great combination.

customer_reviews.title: Good rod will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: All positive, I was surprise that it arrived without any damage.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best do-all rod that I have found
customer_reviews.text: This is the best do-all rod that I have found. Sensitive enough for some channel cats and will take care of some blues and flats. Great with circle hooks and loads perfect with a 4oz lead and a bluegill head. Don't have to worry about guide problems like ugly stiks, pro anglers and others. Solid rod at a great price! Will replace my faulty rods with more Supercats.
customer_reviews.author: C. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful rod!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast and secure. Well packaged. Will be taking it out for PA flat heads this weekend. Well constructed and seems quite sturdy. Will update review after use.

customer_reviews.title: Best rod ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: Easily my favorite rod I've ever owned. Sensitive enough to catch baitfish but has enough backbone to pull in 50+ lb fish. Caught my PB blue cat on this rod with a BPS Cattmax reel, he was 45 lbs!

customer_reviews.title: Very strong to survive in the shipping box

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Rippin lips super cat is a great rod and it looks good to
customer_reviews.author: Redman

customer_reviews.text: Great rod! The last one I got had a huge scratch on it. No biggie, just cosmetic.

customer_reviews.title: Love this rod!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied. Rod was packaged well for shipping. Great looking rod and fishes great. I would absolutely order again

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad replacement rod for the money
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad replacement rod for the money. Did great on 3 to 8 pounders but haven't caught anything bigger to really test its durability and flex, but so far satisfied.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very light, well built rod. The action is a little lighter than most medium heavy catfish rods, but that was what I was looking for.

customer_reviews.title: Must try for any budget catfish angler
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great rod. Very good price for a real catfish rod

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this rod. Not as stiff as other rods I own but definitely tough.

customer_reviews.title: great rod and price is fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: Well so far I love this rod and I paired it up with the kast king Rover 70 R.its a great combo for big Arizona flatheads.plenthy of back bone and yet still sensitive enough to feel the light bite.

customer_reviews.title: this is a real nice rod well built all it says it is matched ...
customer_reviews.text: this is a real nice rod well built all it says it is matched it with a penn320gti reel cant get any better great for the price just ordered another one
customer_reviews.author: hal cooper

customer_reviews.title: This rods so good my first hit on it took it into the ...
customer_reviews.text: This rods so good my first hit on it took it into the lake. The big one that got away with a quality built rod and a hook in his mouth. Time to order another and probably a better rod holder. Never got to land a fish on the ripper yet. However without doubt this rod has the quality of higher end rods $150+ without the hit on your wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel McNamee

customer_reviews.title: Best Catfish rod available for the money can't be beat ...
customer_reviews.text: Best Catfish rod available for the money can't be beat I fish catfish tournaments almost every week highly recommend them

customer_reviews.title: ... a few fish on it so far but I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I've only caught a few fish on it so far but I love it.

customer_reviews.title: Great rod at affordable price!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent rod for a decent price. I use to target Hybrids and Catfish in Oklahoma and so far it has held up well. Great action. Light weight. Stands up to 65 pound braid real well. Own 10 of them and would definitely recommend and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: BigJloree

customer_reviews.title: Great rod it's worth having I own three now
customer_reviews.text: Great rod it's worth having I own three now. Love this rod. great action strong smooth to bring fish in.

customer_reviews.title: mh casting rod
customer_reviews.text: Great looking rod. Have not caught a fish yet but the rod feels great match with abu 6600c4 reel.
customer_reviews.author: Myron Medina

customer_reviews.title: Overall good rod for the price
customer_reviews.text: The rod performed pretty well, the main reason for only a 3-star, is because the reel seat worked loose and the reel fell off.... my wife is a first time fisher and we were glad she caught the reel before it fell into the ocean..... never had this issue before, but I will use the rod again, but I'll just tape up the seat before I cast it out.
customer_reviews.author: M Phelps

customer_reviews.title: sweet looking rod
customer_reviews.text: Great price - looks well made. light. Can't wait to hang on to a monster cat with this rod.
customer_reviews.author: Horse

customer_reviews.title: Fragile / Fatigued Tips ???
customer_reviews.text: OK I have or should say had 4 of these that I ordered over the last 2 years. These are pretty good poles AT FIRST. I have landed some big fish with these poles including 40+ lb Redfish and 6+ foot sharks. I always store/transport my poles with the hook, hooked onto one of the lower eyes. Three of the 4 rods have suffered tip breakage just by unhooking the hook from the lower eyes. The third one happened on a trip this weekend. Photo attached. I is UN-believable how easy these things just snap off. I have two friends that also have these rods and one of them experienced the same breakage on one of their rods last year.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas S.

customer_reviews.title: Best out there for the price
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box, this rod has eye appeal. Very nice color and nice line guides. The guides separate this rod from many others out there. Only thing I would change on it would to put aluminum or stainless reel seat instead of standard. Otherwise this pole can't be matched.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Bought both the medium and the medium heavy these rods are outstanding, and what an awesome color, I put a Kastking Rover on one of them and you could not get a better color match between a reel and a rod.
customer_reviews.author: Fate

customer_reviews.title: Decent cheap rod, arrived broken.
customer_reviews.text: Rod arrived 10 minutes ago with the tip broken between the second and third guide. The second and third guide have been smashed into an oval shape (pics attached). The box is not visibly damaged, but it is 3 different boxes taped together so I'm not sure who to blame for this.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy eugene wood

customer_reviews.title: be cautious
customer_reviews.text: i ordered this pole and was already worried about it breaking in the mail. i read a bunch of reviews and most said it would be very good and could even compete with ugly stick. when i received it, it was broken in the top half. i reordered it and it came quickly. i opened the package and it was broken again this time on the handle. the two spots that were broken should not be broken. this pole seems to be very brittle and i would suggest just buying an ugly stick or something similar.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Lentz

customer_reviews.title: Very nice rod for the time I had it
customer_reviews.text: Very nice rod for the time I had it. Felt great and worked nice up until tonight. Hooked into a fish when it went and snapped on me. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Love these rods.
customer_reviews.text: Great Rods, strong and excellent action! Outstanding for Cat Fish, and light inshore salt water. Get them now before the price goes up. These should last for years!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Nymeyer

product_meta.title: Rippin Lips Super Cat Casting Rod with Glow Tip, 7-Feet 6-Inch/Medium-Heavy
product_meta.description:
Designed by master cat man John Jamison, Rippin Lips' new SuperCat Series feature six carefully selected length/actions, created to conquer the species and situations anglers face daily. Supercat glass our proprietary blend of E-Glass, S-Glass and graphite blank. Light but strong. The supercat 7'6 inch medium heavy action rod is the choice of serious catfish hunters. With a beefed up blank, heavier stainless steel guides and a fast tip, this rod is Tourney anglers #1 choice. You can use it for Bumpin', hangin', dragging' or bottom fishing.Unique among catfishing rods, SuperCat's custom EVA split grip handle yields tremendous balance for battling big fish, plus enhanced power for setting hooks and a comfortable under-arm fit while fishing. When building these rods, Jamison also insisted on extra hard, chrome plated stainless steel guides. (Spinning rod models also feature hard ceramic guide inserts for lighter line applications.) For extra protection and toughness, all guide wraps are epoxy coated. And to assure no bite goes undetected-even at night-all rod tips sport high-visibility tips.
This is the 1 piece version, we also have a 2 piece version on Amazon.
feature_bullets: Split Grip design for Bump'n or Casting
